data.text:
Collegiate Chapters by State

Sigma Alpha Sorority has chapters at 71 campuses across the United States. Check our list below to see if there is a chapter near you. If there isnâ€™t a chapter at your school, learn how to start a chapter!

Sigma Alpha changed my life the day I became a member because it was then that I knew wherever life took me, I could always count on finding sisterhood there.

Alacyn Cox

I love Sigma Alpha because every one is so supportive and passionate. There is nothing better than seeing other sisters making a difference and striving to be their best

Lisa Ecker

I love Sigma Alpha because of the wide network of women in agriculture that is available to me.

Kim Stassen
